enchantment.incantationem.bunnys_hop.des: Grants jump boost while standing on grass/dirt blocks.
enchantment.incantationem.swine_bane.des: Increases damage for swine mobs, such as pigs, piglins and hoglins.
enchantment.incantationem.charmed.desc: Increases loot quality while fishing and your luck with Incantationem's enchantments/curses.
enchantment.incantationem.decay.desc: Randomly inflicts withering to hit entities.
Broken blocks randomly drop their smelted counterpart (e.g. sand -> glass).
enchantment.incantationem.last_stand.des: Randomly applies strength to the user when on low health.
enchantment.incantationem.magnetic.desc: Magnetizes dropped items and experience orbs towards the player.
enchantment.incantationem.reaping_rod.de: Applies enchanted golden apple-like effects to the user when the killing blow to a hostile mob is made.
enchantment.incantationem.retreat.desc: Randomly grants speed when the user is hit.
enchantment.incantationem.venomous.desc: Randomly applies poison to hit entities.
enchantment.incantationem.recklessness.d: Makes all broken blocks not drop at all.
enchantment.incantationem.thunder.desc: Randomly strikes the user with a thunderbolt after they're hit.
enchantment.incantationem.tough_luck.des: Grants permanent unluck effect while using it, decreasing your odds on luck-based events.
